abstract: Widespread fear about the health of the mortgage industry took hold Wednesday afternoon, and investors could not shake the jitters.
snippet: Widespread fear about the health of the mortgage industry took hold Wednesday afternoon, and investors could not shake the jitters.
lead_paragraph: Half an hour was all it took for a dreary day on Wall Street to turn dire.

headline.main: Sharp Fall for Stocks Amid Angst in Lending
headline.print_headline: STOCKS & BONDS; Sharp Fall For Stocks Amid Angst In Lending

abstract: Dow Chemical said Thursday that it has agreed to buy Rohm and Haas, the old-line specialty chemical maker, for about $15.3 billion in cash, one of the largest deals this year and one made with the help of Warren E. Buffett and the Kuwaiti government.
lead_paragraph: Dow Chemical said Thursday that it has agreed to buy Rohm and Haas, the old-line specialty chemical maker, for about $15.3 billion in cash, one of the largest deals this year and one made with the help of Warren E. Buffett and the Kuwaiti government.

headline.main: Dow Chemical to Buy Rohm and Haas for $15.3 Billion

abstract: More details on the acquisition, with the chief executive of Dow Chemical, Andrew Liveris, on CNBC.

lead_paragraph: More details on the acquisition, with the chief executive of Dow Chemical, Andrew Liveris, on CNBC.

headline.main: Dow Chemical Chief on Deal for Rival

abstract: CNBC interviews Andrew Liveris, chief executive of Dow Chemical, on the strategy behind the deal.
